00036 #include <cwtones.h>
00037 
00038 //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 // An ASR envelope on a complex phasor,
00040 // with asynchronous trigger for R stage.
00041 // A/R use sine shaping.
00042 //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00043 
00044 BOOLEAN CWTone( CWToneGen cwt )
00045 {
00046     int i,
00047         n = cwt->size;
00048 
00049     ComplexOSC( cwt->osc.gen );
00050 
00051     for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00052     {
00053 
00054         // in an envelope stage?
00055 
00056         if ( cwt->stage == CWTone_RISE )
00057         {
00058 
00059             // still going?
00060             if ( cwt->rise.have++ < cwt->rise.want )
00061             {
00062                 cwt->curr += cwt->rise.incr;
00063                 cwt->mul = cwt->scl * ( REAL ) sin( cwt->curr * M_PI / 2.0 );
00064             }
00065             else
00066             {
00067                 // no, assert steady-state, force level
00068                 cwt->curr = 1.0;
00069                 cwt->mul = cwt->scl;
00070                 cwt->stage = CWTone_STDY;
00071                 // won't come back into envelopes
00072                 // until FALL asserted from outside
00073             }
00074 
00075         }
00076         else if ( cwt->stage == CWTone_FALL )
00077         {
00078 
00079             // still going?
00080             if ( cwt->fall.have++ < cwt->fall.want )
00081             {
00082                 cwt->curr -= cwt->fall.incr;
00083                 cwt->mul = cwt->scl * ( REAL ) sin( cwt->curr * M_PI / 2.0 );
00084             }
00085             else
00086             {
00087                 // no, assert trailing, force level
00088                 cwt->curr = 0.0;
00089                 cwt->mul = 0.0;
00090                 cwt->stage = CWTone_HOLD;
00091                 // won't come back into envelopes hereafter
00092             }
00093         }
00094         // apply envelope
00095         // (same base as osc.gen internal buf)
00096         CXBdata( cwt->buf, i ) = Cscl( CXBdata( cwt->buf, i ), cwt->mul );
00097     }
00098 
00099     // indicate whether it's turned itself off
00100     // sometime during this pass
00101 
00102     return cwt->stage != CWTone_HOLD;
00103 }
00104 
00105 //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00106 // turn tone on with current settings
00107 
00108 void CWToneOn( CWToneGen cwt )
00109 {
00110 
00111     // gain is in dB
00112 
00113     cwt->scl = ( REAL ) pow( 10.0, cwt->gain / 20.0 );
00114     cwt->curr = cwt->mul = 0.0;
00115 
00116     // A/R times are in msec
00117 
00118     cwt->rise.want = ( int ) ( 0.5 + cwt->sr * ( cwt->rise.dur / 1e3 ) );
00119     cwt->rise.have = 0;
00120     if ( cwt->rise.want <= 1 )
00121         cwt->rise.incr = 1.0;
00122     else
00123         cwt->rise.incr = 1.0f / ( cwt->rise.want - 1 );
00124 
00125     cwt->fall.want = ( int ) ( 0.5 + cwt->sr * ( cwt->fall.dur / 1e3 ) );
00126     cwt->fall.have = 0;
00127     if ( cwt->fall.want <= 1 )
00128         cwt->fall.incr = 1.0;
00129     else
00130         cwt->fall.incr = 1.0f / ( cwt->fall.want - 1 );
00131 
00132     // freq is in Hz
00133 
00134     OSCfreq( cwt->osc.gen ) = 2.0 * M_PI * cwt->osc.freq / cwt->sr;
00135     OSCphase( cwt->osc.gen ) = 0.0;
00136 
00137     cwt->stage = CWTone_RISE;
00138 }
00139 
00140 //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00141 // initiate turn-off
00142 
00143 void CWToneOff( CWToneGen cwt )
00144 {
00145     cwt->stage = CWTone_FALL;
00146 }
00147 
00148 //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00149 
00150 void setCWToneGenVals( CWToneGen cwt, REAL gain, REAL freq, REAL rise,
00151                        REAL fall )
00152 {
00153     cwt->gain = gain;
00154     cwt->osc.freq = freq;
00155     cwt->rise.dur = rise;
00156     cwt->fall.dur = fall;
00157 }
00158 
00159 CWToneGen newCWToneGen( REAL gain,  // dB
00160                         REAL freq,  // Hz
00161                         REAL rise,  // ms
00162                         REAL fall,  // ms
00163                         int size, REAL samplerate )
00164 {
00165 
00166     CWToneGen cwt = ( CWToneGen ) safealloc( 1, sizeof( CWToneGenDesc ),
00167                                              "CWToneGenDesc" );
00168 
00169     setCWToneGenVals( cwt, gain, freq, rise, fall );
00170     cwt->size = size;
00171     cwt->sr = samplerate;
00172 
00173     cwt->osc.gen =
00174         newOSC( cwt->size, ComplexTone, ( double ) cwt->osc.freq, 0.0,
00175                 cwt->sr, "CWTone osc" );
00176 
00177     // overload oscillator buf
00178     cwt->buf = newCXB( cwt->size, OSCCbase( cwt->osc.gen ), "CWToneGen buf" );
00179 
00180     return cwt;
00181 }
00182 
00183 void delCWToneGen( CWToneGen cwt )
00184 {
00185     if ( cwt )
00186     {
00187         delCXB( cwt->buf );
00188         delOSC( cwt->osc.gen );
00189         safefree( ( char * ) cwt );
00190     }
00191 }
